name: MICRO CADAM-X/6000 Model Data File
summary: Learn about .MCX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MCX files are also supported by CATIA-CADAM software.

description: 3D model format used by Mastercam X and X2 CAD/CAM software; used for developing 3D models of parts, molds, and fixtures; may contain solids, surfaces, and wireframe data; commonly referred to the MC-X format.
